summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 11.8°C) and outside temperature (down 11.6°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 11%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 12187 lux) and cloud levels (up 358 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 16463 lux), the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 243 m), and outside humidity (down 6%) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; prepare for cold, chilly weather ahead. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail and gentle light winds are expected. Drizzle or light rain possible, overcast skies with low cloud, and it’s dark. The weather will likely remain the same.
